movies.title: Mordsfreunde
movies.plot: In Hessen region Taunus's zoo, posthumously severed adult male limbs are found in different animal cages. Director Christoph Sander points at vandalizing animal rights activist, popular private gymnasium language teacher and former party animal Hans-Ulrich 'Uli' Pauly's unruly bunch, but the corpse is found in a field and identified as his own. Oliver von Bodenstein's Hochheim police team tracks down Uli's bunch and former study friends, ac olourful bunch yielding private and business motives. As they discover links to more citizens, arson and a hanging occur, but a cop's own dark secret also ties in.
movies.simplePlot: In Hessen region Taunus's zoo, posthumously severed adult male limbs are found in different animal cages. Director Christoph Sander points at vandalizing animal rights activist, popular ...

biography.bio: Felicitas Woll was born on January 20, 1980 in Harbshausen, Hessen, Germany. She is an actress, known for Berlin, Berlin (2002), Dresde 1945, chronique d'un amour (2006) and Die Camper (1997).
biography.name: Felicitas Woll

biography.bio: Tim Bergmann was born on March 2, 1972 in Düsseldorf, North Rhine-Westphalia, Germany. He is an actor, known for Rommel (2012), Regular Guys (1996) and Tarragone, du paradis à l'enfer (2007).
biography.name: Tim Bergmann

biography.bio: Edin Hasanovic was born on April 2, 1992 in Bosnia and Herzegovina, Yugoslavia. He is an actor, known for L'irréparable (2012), Familie Braun (2016) and Auf kurze Distanz (2016).
biography.name: Edin Hasanovic

biography.bio: Michael Brandner was born on January 22, 1951 in Augsburg, Bavaria, Germany. He is an actor, known for Hubert und Staller (2011), Downfall (2004) and The Monuments Men (2014). He has been married to Karin since 1997. They have one child.
biography.name: Michael Brandner

biography.bio: Jana Klinge was born on November 24, 1980 in Osnabrück, Lower Saxony, West Germany. She is an actress, known for R.I.S. - Die Sprache der Toten (2007), Geld.Macht.Liebe (2009) and The Secret Society of Fine Arts (2012).
biography.name: Jana Klinge

biography.bio: Anke Sevenich was born on January 30, 1959 in Frankfurt am Main, Germany. She is an actress, known for Klinikum Berlin Mitte - Leben in Bereitschaft (2000), For Good Reason (1991) and Kanzlei Bürger (1995).
biography.name: Anke Sevenich

biography.bio: Kai Scheve was born on February 11, 1966 in Steinheidel-Erlabrunn, Germany. He is an actor, known for Freundschaft mit Herz (1995), No Sex (1999) and Ein Dorf sucht seinen Mörder (2002).
biography.name: Kai Scheve

biography.bio: Julius Römer was born on July 29, 1995 in Bissendorf, Lower Saxony, Germany. He is an actor, known for Sacré Charlie (2006), Stella et l'étoile d'Orient (2008) and Die Gänsemagd (2009).
biography.name: Julius Römer

biography.bio: Sina Fredrich is an actress, known for Mordsfreunde (2014), Schneewittchen muss sterben (2013) and Crash (2008).
biography.name: Sina Fredrich

biography.bio: Michael Schenk was born on December 21, 1965 in Osnabrück, Germany. He is an actor and writer, known for Bridge of Spies (2015), The White Ribbon (2009) and The Reader (2008).
biography.name: Michael Schenk

biography.bio: Guido Broscheit is a well known actor in german television. Born in 1968, he spent his childhood and youth in western Germany. Before becoming an actor he was a lawyer. He is a Berlin based actor, known for Horst Schlämmer - Isch kandidiere! (2009), Schnitzel geht immer (2017) and Pälzisch im Abgang (2015).
biography.name: Guido Broscheit

biography.bio: Peter Davor was born on July 3, 1963 in Zagreb, Yugoslavia [now Croatia]. He is an actor, known for Quatre minutes (2006), Shattered Glass (2002) and Summer of '04 (2006).
biography.name: Peter Davor

biography.bio: Merlin Rose was born in January 1993. He is an actor, known for Le temps des rêves (2015), Shed My Skin (2016) and Doktorspiele (2014).
biography.name: Merlin Rose

biography.bio: Wilson Gonzales Ochsenknecht was born on 18th March 1990 in Germany, as the oldest child of the German actor Uwe Ochsenknecht and the German actress Natascha Ochsenknecht. He has a younger brother named Jimi Blue Ochsenknecht and a little sister. Like his brother he started acting very early and their father was not the only inspiration to start acting. Together with his little brother and his father he played in movies like: Illumination garantie (1999), Die Wilden Kerle: Alles ist gut, solange du wild bist! (2003) and Die Wilden Kerle 2 (2005). In September 2004, Wilson and his brother Jimi got the Undine Award for best débutant from the Austrian trade association of audio versions and film industry. Wilson is a total sport fan and loves soccer, mountain-biking, skating, snowboarding, go-kart driving and snorkeling.
biography.name: Wilson Gonzalez

biography.bio: Thomas Huber was born on July 11, 1963 in Munich, Bavaria, West Germany. He is an actor and writer, known for Æon Flux (2005), Grimm Love (2006) and Die Anstalt - Zurück ins Leben (2001).
biography.name: Thomas Huber
